name: Anti-Personnel
description: 10% damage against humans.

name: Bashing
description: Deals double damage when gun bashing.

name: Berserker
description: Does more damage the less armor one has.

name: Cornered
description: Damage increases as health decreases.

name: Disassembler
description: +20% damage against robots.

name: Extended Magazine
description: Doubles the base magazine capacity.

name: Exterminator
description: +30% damage against ailens.

name: Furious
description: Each consecutive hit deals more damage.

name: Instigating
description: Deals double damage to targets with full health.

name: Space-Adept
description: +30% damage while in space, and -15% damage while on a planet.

name: Corrosive
description: Randomly deals corrosive damage and reduces the targets' armor over 6 seconds.

name: Crippling
description: Deals +30% damage on the next attack after hitting a target's limbs.

name: Handloading
description: Volatile rounds that are designed to pack a bigger punch, but aren't as stable and can fail on occasion.

name: Hitman
description: +15% damage while aiming.

name: Incendiary
description: Randomly deals incendiary damage.

name: Lacerate
description: Randomly applies a bleed effect to the target.

name: Med Theft
description: Chance that humans drop extra Med Packs on death.

name: Poison
description: Randomly deals poison damage and slows the target.

name: Rapid
description: +25% increase in attack speed.

name: Staggering
description: Small chance to stagger enemies.

name: Concussive
description: Small chance to knock down targets.

name: Demoralizing
description: Small chance to demoralize a target.

name: Explosive
description: Randomly switches to explosive rounds.

name: Frenzy
description: Small chance to frenzy a target.

name: One Inch Punch
description: Rounds fire in a shotgun-like spread.

name: Shattering
description: Break through even the strongest armor.

name: Skip Shot
description: Every fourth shot fires two projectiles at once.

name: Telsa
description: Rounds will sometimes emit electricity where they land that damages and slows nearby targets.

name: Titanium Build
description: Premium build materials make this weapon light as a feather
